solution.text:
Height of cone,h \(=_{j}_\)cm
Diameter of cone,d \(=_{k}_\)cm\(\Rightarrow\)Radius,r\(=_{{k/Decimal(2)}}_\)cm
Slant height,l\(=\sqrt{h^2+r^2}=\sqrt{_{j}_^2+_{{k/Decimal(2)}}_^2}=_{{trunc(((j**2+(k/Decimal(2))**2)**Decimal(0.5)),3)}}_\)cm
Total surface area\(=\pi r(l+r)\)
\(=\pi \times _{{k/Decimal(2)}}_ \times (_{{trunc(((j**2+(k/Decimal(2))**2)**Decimal(0.5)),3)}}_+_{{k/Decimal(2)}}_)\)
\(=_{{trunc((pi_val*(k/Decimal(2))*((j**2+(k/Decimal(2))**2)**Decimal(0.5)+k/Decimal(2))),3)}}_\,cm^2\)

content.text: The total surface area of the cone.
